hero.title: Choose Your House Project
hero.description: Discover our collection of meticulously designed house projects. Find the perfect plan for your dream home. Each project includes all necessary documentation for you to purchase and build.

featured.description: Explore our most popular and innovative house projects.

remembered.emptyDescription: Start browsing our house projects and remember the ones you're interested in to see them here.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building Dreams, One Project at a Time
about.description: We specialize in creating individual house projects that bring your dreams to life. Our goal is to help you build your dream home with all necessary documentation.
about.missionText: To provide innovative, high-quality house projects that help people build their dream homes with confidence and style.
about.visionText: To provide as many individual house projects as possible, connecting homeowners with exceptional solutions.
about.valuesText: Responsibility, quality, and customer satisfaction are at the heart of everything we do.

features.designTeamDesc: Years of experience creating individual house projects.
features.documentationDesc: Every house project includes all necessary documentation for you to build it.
features.qualityDesc: All our projects comply with regulations to ensure successful project delivery.
features.supportDesc: Our team is here to help you every step of the way.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Have questions about our house projects? Need help choosing the right design? Our team is here to help you every step of the way.

1.name: Modern Minimalist Villa

2.name: Classic Family Home
